helpText: Đ_Edit, delete, or reorder categories in your organization______________________________ớ.

generic.title: Đ_Error updating categories__________________________ớ
generic.message: Đ_Something went wrong. Please try again later________________________ớ.

maxDepthExceeded.title: Đ_Error updating categories__________________________ớ
maxDepthExceeded.message: Đ_You cannot nest categories more than 2 levels deep___________________________ớ.

destinationHasSameName.title: Đ_Error updating categories__________________________ớ
destinationHasSameName.message: Đ_A category with the same name already exists in the destination category______________________________________ớ.

noSchema.title: Đ_Schema not found_________________ớ
noSchema.message: Đ_Item schema not found for user_________________ớ.

maxCharacter.title: Đ_Error updating categories__________________________ớ
maxCharacter.message: Đ_Category names can be a maximum of ${maxCharacter} characters long___________________________________ớ.

deleteInUseCategory.title: Đ_Delete category________________ớ
deleteInUseCategory.message: Đ_${numItem} items are assigned to this category. Deleting the category will also remove it from these items_______________________________________________________ớ.

custom.title: Đ_Custom categories__________________ớ
custom.message: Đ_Create your own categories to organize content within your organization_____________________________________ớ.

arcgis.title: Đ_ArcGIS categories__________________ớ
arcgis.message: Đ_ArcGIS categories include a selection of topic categories and subcategories that can be used to categorize many types of geospatial content. These categories are used to support ArcGIS Living Atlas of the World___________________________________________________________________________________________________________ớ.

iso.title: Đ_ISO categories_______________ớ
iso.message: Đ_ISO categories includes topic categories from the International Organization for Standardization that provide a method for describing and cataloging geographic information_______________________________________________________________________________________ớ.

inspire.title: Đ_INSPIRE categories___________________ớ
inspire.message: Đ_INSPIRE categories include a comprehensive set of spatial data themes set out in the INSPIRE Directive_____________________________________________________ớ.
